column2: Black Panther: The Man Without Fear (2010) #515
column6: For the fate of Hell's Kitchen: T'Challa vs. Vlad the Impaler in a desperate rooftop battle of wills, wits and fists!  "Urban Jungle" heats up as Luke Cage guest-stars, friends fall, dark forces prepare to step from the shadows, and a dangerous conspiracy begins to unfold!
column8: | penciller (cover):Simone Bianchi | penciller:Francesco Francavilla | writer:David Liss | editor:Bill Rosemann
